snippet: Wily Czech Radek Stepanek, the oldest player in the men's singles, will take his bag of tricks out on Philippe Chatrier Court against world number two Andy Murray as the French Open plays catch-up on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Wily Czech Radek Stepanek, the oldest player in the men's singles, will take his bag of tricks out on Philippe Chatrier Court against world number two Andy Murray as the French Open plays catch-up on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Murray and Wawrinka Face Czech Threats
headline.main: Murray and Wawrinka Face Czech Threats
